author: shachor
msg: The session id is now a part of the path (used to be a variable)

author: craigmcc
msg: Remove information that duplicates content already present in the User Guide.
Add the first known issue -- absolute paths for document roots under Windows
MUST include the drive letter prefix.

author: craigmcc
msg: Partial fix for the "absolute paths starting with '\' under Windows" problem.
The default servlet now serves files correctly, but there are still problems with
class loading, indicating that something in the class path setters is still treating
these paths as relative (probably because it's calling java.io.File.isAbsolute() instead of

author: craigmcc
msg: Beginnings of a more complete Release Notes document for the 3.1 release
(currently marked for 3.1beta1; should be changed to 3.1 for the final).
